Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "You're on time for once. Looks like you've had some time to reflect, huh?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'So do you know why I called you here?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yep, pretty much...', 3: '7', 4: 'Babel Tower?', 5: '7'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Good. Spares me the effort to explain.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'We\'ve now entered the fourth stage of "Project Babel". You will still be in charge of testing it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yep. Been there, done that.', 3: '10'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Anyway, just relax. I want the combat data to be as accurate as possible. You'll ruin it if you take it too much to heart.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Oh, just one little new thing before the test.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What new thing?', 3: '13'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "We've expanded the combat squad options this time. You can change your roster according to the fights.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "I'm sure you'll find it beneficial.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "After all, if memory serves me right, you've frequently commanded temporary squads to carry out combat missions to great success.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Oh, I just got lucky...', 3: '17'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Oh, and don't forget, you can adjust the overall combat intensity according to your own needs.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "But I'm sure you'll be able to handle the hardest difficulty. Want me to set the default to the hardest?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Just let me customize inside!', 3: '20'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Alright then. Any battle intensity works, I'll be able to collect more data comprehensively.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Well, I've told you everything you need to know. I'll tell you the rest inside the tower.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Hopefully, you can provide more useful combat data to make all this overtime worthwhile.', 4: '1'}
